amendment.description: To strike section 206, relating to security capitol cost sharing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1193 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1193 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9203-9205; text: CR S9203) To strike section 206, relating to security capitol cost sharing.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1193 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1193 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
